node.statement: SETUP: For a restricted partition lambda = (lambda_1 > ... > lambda_n >= 0) with distinct parts (unique part 0, no part 1), the set S_n(lambda) of compositions is identified with configurations of a multispecies particle system on n sites of a ring. Each composition mu = (mu_1,...,mu_n) encodes the species of particle at site i, with 0 = vacancy. The restriction conditions (unique 0, no 1) ensure that vacancies and particle species are well-separated.
